//: Every spell that a monster casts are explained here. There's no way of telling you the description in-game, and here we are, reading infos about 'em at this file! Since monsters can only have one spell in their special attacks (and idk if this is intentional to the devs), I tend to combine them... Combo (combination) spell and a regular one, casted in an instance!
